name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic
description:
When a power hungry, egotistical witch spreads her dark magic across the land, it is up to one raccoon to stop her! Play as Roxy, an adventurous young cub as she rolls through four unique worlds in order to end the witch’s dastardly plans!

Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic is a retelling of the original platformer, this told through an energetic and unique pinball format. End the witch’s wicked curse and conquer her many challenges. Prove, once and for all, that you are the true pinball champion!


8 Pinball Tables with 4 Unique Themes inspired by tables from the 80s to the modern era!

Online Achievements and Leaderboards will showcase your pinball prowess to the world!

Unique Story Mode allows you to relive iconic moments from Roxy Raccoon in a reimagined pinball environment!

Experience classic Pinball action in Arcade Mode with optional "Roxy-Assist" which allows you to manipulate her rolls!

Roll in style as you unlock colorful new cosmetics to customize Roxy’s appearance.
